pr_title: NXP-29067: add the command line name to the created tmp directory

timeline.bodyText: Extra unneeded set of parentheses, and could be inlined in the line below anyway.
timeline.author: efge

timeline.bodyText: Actually getFile() is part of the Blob interface so there's no need for a cast at all — unless you want to verify that it's actually a FileBlob.
timeline.author: efge

timeline.message:
NXP-29067: add the command line name to the created tmp directory

This would be useful when debugging to know which command line
has created the tmp directory
